channel.title: Upgrade problem
channel.description:
Hi,
After checking for updates it wants to install virtualbox-guest-dkms (6.1.4-dfsg-2), but Whonix Gateway freezes at 'Building initial module for 4.19.0-8-amd64'.
My Oracle VM version is: 6.0.18 r136238 (Qt5.6.2) My Whonix Gateway version is: 15.0.0.8.9

item.title: Upgrade problem
item.dc:creator: argus
item.description:
I searched before posting, but I missed that thread. I increased the VRAM to 1024 and upgrade was successful.
Thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: Upgrade problem
item.dc:creator: Patrick_mobile
item.description:
Gateway apt dist-upgrade hangs on update Build initial module - Solution in Post Number 2 Support
today i update my whonix Whonix-XFCE-15 gateway. Now it hangs on: Build initial module for 4.19.0-8-amd64 After a restart i have tried: sudo dpkg --configure -a but it hangs on Build initial module for 4.19.0-8-amd64 also. i have waited about 15 minutes and nothing happens. What can i do to fix it?

Read full topic

item.title: Upgrade problem
